pkgmetadata.longdescription: # lvmcam![Versions](https://img.shields.io/badge/python->3.8-blue)[![Test](https://github.com/sdss/lvmcam/actions/workflows/test.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/sdss/lvmcam/actions/workflows/test.yml)[![Documentation Status](https://readthedocs.org/projects/sdss-lvmcam/badge/?version=latest)](https://sdss-lvmcam.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest)[![codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/sdss/lvmcam/branch/main/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/gh/sdss/lvmcam)The package for [lvmagp](https://github.com/sdss/lvmagp).# Quickstart poetry run lvmcam --config python/lvmcam/etc/lvm.sci.agcam.yml start --debug poetry run python utils/simple_camui.py# See also- [clu](https://github.com/sdss/clu)- [archon](https://github.com/sdss/archon)- [basecam](https://github.com/sdss/basecam)- [araviscam](https://github.com/sdss/araviscam)- [skymakercam](https://github.com/sdss/skymakercam)- [LVM_FLIR_Software](https://github.com/sdss/LVM_FLIR_Software)
